# TabletopInteraction.HoverAlignmentSource.baseOrTop

**Case**

Either the top or bottom face (one of the two faces parallel to the XZ plane)

## Declaration

```swift
case baseOrTop
```

## Alignment sources

- **TabletopInteraction.HoverAlignmentSource.base**: The bottom face of the object (the face parallel the XZ plane with lowest value of Y)
